snippet: Keep the Promise I said it would also increase its field operations in the state, as Mr. Cruz and his allies hope to capitalize on Donald J. Trump’s perceived weakness in ground organization.

headline.main: Group Backing Ted Cruz Makes $573,000 Ad Buy in Nevada
